Uses of Class
jparsec.graph.ChartSeriesElement

  • Packages that use ChartSeriesElement 
    Package Description
    jparsec.astrophysics.gildas
    Classes to manipulate Gildas files.
    jparsec.graph
    Creates charts using JFreeChart, SGT, VISAD, SurfacePlotter, and JMathPlot.
    jparsec.math
    Tools to apply different common math operations in astrophysics.

    • Uses of ChartSeriesElement in jparsec.astrophysics.gildas

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChartSeriesElement ProcessSpectrum.getFullGaussianFit(double[] g, Spectrum30m.XUNIT xUnit)
      Returns a series with the Gaussian fit of a line, where each value of index i represents the intensity for channel i+1 (first channel is 1 at index 0).
      ChartSeriesElement ProcessSpectrum.getGaussianFit(double[] g, Spectrum30m.XUNIT xUnit)
      Returns a series with the Gaussian fit of a line.
